name: Carroot Vs Parsnip
description:
A 3D Brawler, following our protagonist "Carroot" as he battles the evil Parsnip. The parsnips had been driven crazy due to an unknown phenomenon (probably bacteria) which caused them to setup brawling arenas, forcing the other vegetables to battle it out to determine which of them tastes the best. 

---------------------------------------------------

PLEASE BE AWARE THAT TO EXPERIENCE THIS GAME IN IT'S INTENDED MANOR, YOU WILL NEED A SECOND PERSON.

IF YOU DO NOT HAVE A NUMBER PAD ON YOUR KEYBOARD, YOU WILL NEED A CONTROLLER OR A KEYBOARD THAT HAS ONE.

---------------------------------------------------

Controls :

Player 1 : 
 - Movement : WASD
 - Attack : J
 - Special Attack : K (Hold)
 - Jump : W / Spacebar

Player 2 : 
 - Movement : Arrow Keys / Controller Right Analog Stick
 - Attack : Num1 / Button East / Circle (Playstation) / B (XBox)
 - Special Attack : Num2 / Button West / Square (Playstation) / X (XBox) 
 - Jump : Up Arrow / Num0 / Button South / X (Playstation) / A (XBox)

---------------------------------------------------

Installation: 

- Unzip "CarrootVsParsnip.zip"
- Run "CarrootVsParsnip.exe"
- Enjoy!
